pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, March 6, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Tuesday, March 6, 2018:

Ottawa, Ontario

9:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in an armchair discussion with Bill Nye highlighting Budget 2018 investments in Canadian innovation.

Huguette Labelle Hall
Tabaret Hall, University of Ottawa
550 Cumberland Street

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 9:15 a.m. and present themselves to room 117.
